verses.text: Aton vab'ixal a in Nehemías in tik, yuninal in vinhaj Hacalías. Ayic 20 ab'ilxo yoch vinhaj Artajerjes reyal, t'a jun uj scuchan Quisleu, ayinek' t'a Susa scapitalil Persia.
Ata' ix k'och vinh vuk'tac scuchan Hanani yet' juntzanhxo eb' ix cot yet' vinh t'a Judá. Ix in k'anb'an t'a eb' tas yaj Jerusalén yet' eb' yinhtilal eb' anima ik'b'ilcot t'a Babilonia.
Ix yalan eb' t'ayin: Ha eb' quetchonhab' chi' ayek' eb' t'a Judá, te cusk'olal yajek' eb', te q'uixveltac yajek' eb'. Axo Jerusalén chi' mak'b'ilem smuroal, tz'anacpaxb'at spuertail, xchi eb'.
Ayic ix vab'an juntzanh chi', ix in em k'ojan, ix in oq'ui. Ix in te cus val jaye' k'ual. Ix in och t'a tzek'ojk'olal, ix in lesalvi t'a sDiosal satcha’anh.
Ix valan icha tik: Mamin Jehová sDiosal satcha’anh, te niwan elk'ochi, te ay a may, tzaq'uelk'och a trato yet' eb' tzach xajanani, eb' sk'anab'ajan a checnab'il.

Tzin k'an t'ayach to tza cha ab' in lesal a in a checab' in tik. D'a junjun k'u yet' t'a junjun ak'val tzin tevi t'ayach cuuj a onh a chonhab' onh tik, a checab' caji. Svalq'ueta co mul t'ayach. Ha onh tik yet' eb' co mam quicham, ix och co mul t'ayach.
Te chuk ix cutej co b'a t'ayach. Maj co k'anab'ajej a checnab'il, a k'ayb'ub'al yet' tas a chec yalnaccan vinh a checab' aj Moisés t'ayonh.
Nacot tas alnac t'a vinh a checab' chi': Tato manh ol e k'anab'ajej tas ix vala', ol ex in saclemejcanb'at t'a scaltac juntzanhxo ch'oc chonhab'il.

Palta tato ol ex meltzajxoc t'ayin jun, ol e k'anab'ajan in checnab'il, tze b'eyb'alani, wach'chom sacleminac eyajcanb'at b'aj slajvik'och yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ol ex in molb'ejxicot t'a jun lugar to sik'b'ilel vuuj, b'aj tz'och ejmelal t'ayin, xa chi.
Ha onh a checab' onh tik, a chonhab' onh paxi, ix onh a col yet' a poder.

Mamin, tzin k'an t'ayach to tza cha ab' in lesal a in a checab' in tik yet' tas sk'an juntzanhxo eb' a checab' to sco nib'ej tzach quik'chaanh. Tzin k'an t'ayach to tzak' a wach'k'olal t'ayin, yic wach' scha yab' vinh rey tas ol vala', xin chi. Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi' ayin och sb'achumaloc svino vinhaj rey Artajerjes chi'.
